    Retrieves the source text of the draft, a string representation of a JSON structure.
    SourceFormat
    getBodySrcFormat()
    Retrieves format of the source text of the draft, plain-text by default; the list of available formats is returned in PostingFeatures .
    CommentOperations
    getCommentOperations()
    Retrieves draft of the list of operations and the corresponding principals that are overridden in the posting's comments .

    Retrieves type of the draft.

    Retrieves list of the media attached to the draft, the media may be located on another node.

    Retrieves story publication timestamp - the time the story must be published under in the feed.

    getReceiverCommentId()
    Retrieves ID of the comment, mandatory for comment-update type.

    Retrieves name of the node the draft is related to.
